name: Make One More Song...
description:
Only you can find the answer...

A year ago the famous composer Y. K. Hymn ran to the castle of the family in the forest to create his ultimate masterpiece.

While everybody things he is busy composing, you get the filling that the things may be a little off around the castle. You entered the oddly wide open gate of the castle and now inside search for any clue of the missing musician.

WASD for movement

Press "P" key to exit the game.
